about.details:
CMM Infraprojects Limited is Indore, Madhya Pradesh based infrastructure project developer. CMM Infraprojects is an Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) Company with experience in end-to-end design and construction of various projects.Company does Buildings and Roads construction on contract basis.

CMM Infraprojects was originally started in 1979 and listed its Equity Shares on the Institutional Trading Platform (ITP) of the NSE on April 01, 2015. Later company voulantary got delisted with on July 06, 2016.

CMM Infraprojects have executed multiple projects with the Government / PSUs / Corporates & various other organizations across different sectors and verticals in state of Madhya Pradesh, Odisha, Chhattisgarh, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Bihar, Goa, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh.

Company Strengths:
1. Primary focus of our business is on Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC).
2. Investments in modern construction equipment.
3. Geographical footprint continues to grow.
4. Substantial growth in past few years.
5. 90% revenue from Govt. contracts.

contactDetails.full_address: CMM Infraprojects Limited, 108 Shalimar Corporate Cente, 8-B, South Tukoganj

faqs.question: What is the CMM Infraprojects IPO?
faqs.answer:
CMM Infraprojects IPO is a SME IPO of 4545000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.18 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2017, and closes on October 4, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in CMM Infraprojects IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in CMM Infraprojects IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in CMM Infraprojects IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in CMM Infraprojects IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'CMM Infraprojects IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When CMM Infraprojects IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The CMM Infraprojects IPO opens on September 29, 2017 and closes on October 4, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of CMM Infraprojects IPO?
faqs.answer: CMM Infraprojects IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for CMM Infraprojects IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in CMM Infraprojects IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
